doc.title: What Cassandra Saw
doc.plot: What Cassandra saw is a post-modern fairytale in which Cassandra Demeanour discovers by accident the Bureau of Shadows, allowing an insight into the secret and usually unseen world. Headed by Mr Lacuna and the three triplets, each in charge of separate department, responsible for making measuring and resizing our shadows, while we are a sleep, in the midst of dreaming. The Bureau of Shadows are experiencing some problems, Mr Lacuna, has without explanation disappeared to leave the triplets to run the departments in his absence. Of late Mistakes have been happening.
